mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.review_pk, u.nickname, r.title, r.regdate, r.state FROM wego.review r, wego.user u WHERE r.user_pk = u.user_pk) r LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM wego.review_image i WHERE i.filestate = 0) i ON r.review_pk = i.review_pk WHERE r.state = 0 ORDER BY regdate desc LIMIT 4;
